snippet.title: DUGA Release Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD: https://maxwellsalmon.itch.io/DUGA

DUGA is an oldschool first person shooter with roguelike elements. Inspired by games such as Wolfenstein 3D and Doom. It features procedurally generated levels, over 20 weapons and fierce combat!

The game is based on a custom raycaster game engine made in Python using the Pygame framework. It has been in development for over 2 years. 

DOWNLOAD: https://maxwellsalmon.itch.io/DUGA

SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/MaxwellSalmon/DUGA/

Licenses:
Custom music done by Hud-Lum at soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/hud-lum
Drone Space Wind Scifi sound by ztitchez on Freesound.org
